ending_theme: #01: "Toukyou Gorin Ondo (東京五輪音頭)" by Haruo Minami (eps 1, 13)
#02: "Utsukushii Juudai (美しい十代)" by Akira Mita (ep 2)
#03: "Nagaiki Chonpa (Funabashi Health Center) (長生きチョンパ (船橋ヘルスセンター))" by Toshie Kusunoki (ep 3)
#04: "Boku wa Nai Chicchi (僕は泣いちっち)" by Hiroshi Moriya (ep 4)
#05: "Aa Ueno Eki (あゝ上野駅)" by Hachirou Izawa (ep 5)
#06: "Hondara Koushinkyoku (ホンダラ行進曲)" by Hajime Hana & Crazy Cats (ep 6)
#07: "Koi no Vacance (恋のバカンス)" by The Peanuts (ep 7)
#09: "Sudara Bushi (スーダラ節)" by Hitoshi Ueki (ep 9)
#10: "Furimukanaide (ふりむかないで)" by The Peanuts (ep 10)
#11: "Yoake no Uta (夜明けのうた)" by Youko Kishi (ep 11)
#12: "Nanimo Iwanaide (何も云わないで)" by Mari Sono (ep 12)
